ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Quotation_Status__c,"Awaiting costs suppliers") && ISPICKVAL(Freight_Mode__c, "ROAD") && ISPICKVAL(Service_Mode__c, "NATIONAL") && ISPICKVAL(Service_Type__c, "FTL") && ISBLANK( Awaiting_unload_time__c )=TRUE && NOT($Profile.Name = 'CUSTOMER COMMUNITY')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ERROR: MUST BE DEFINE AWAITING UNLOAD TIME
